name: Alexavier Hunt
description: I would describe myself as an easy-going, sociable, open-minded person, who loves adventures and discover new things around the world and about getting more knowledge from this impressive world! I dream of having a happy family and give all my love and all my attention to my family. I dream to see a lot of amazing places of our world with my lovely woman. I want to enjoy every minute of our happy life. I can characterise myself as a happy person, but for my happiness I just miss the main – my Darling, to share all my love, affection and tenderness with. I dream of having a happy ! family and give all my love and all my attention to my family. My heart is always open to nice people! And I hope, that you will live in my heart. Come to me, dear, I am waiting for you.
